text: [sniffing]
What is that smell?
Uh, I think it's Trevor.
Quite the accusation, Candle.

But before we start
smearing Trevor's good name,

I say we conduct
an investigation.

Someone on this bus is
responsible for the odor,

and no one is leaving
until I determine who.

Where were you between waking
up and getting dressed?
Uh, shower.

Helen's drive to be discovered
ensured her grooming would
be of the highest priority.

And from this soap residue on
Principal Secretary's feathers,

it's clear he's not
our suspect either.

The smell stems from
a rather pungent
version of Camembert cheese.

And only one student is
likely to have access
to such a delicacy, Candle Fox.
I admit it.
It was me.

I couldn't wait until lunch,
so I had a slice of cheese.
I'm sorry.

It was Candle who
cut the literal cheese.
Thank you!
[horn beeps]
